main event: An oval-circular object with a dome top was observed in Cape Province, South Africa on December 7, 1954.
interesting points: The object came from the east towards the observer before turning sharply and speeding away rapidly., The object was observed for 3 minutes., It emitted no sound during the sighting., The sighting attracted a good deal of attention., The report is sourced from the U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: one oval-circular object with a dome top
